Haifa Rahim, bụ onye Algeria na-eme ihe nkiri
A maara ya nke ọma dịka onye nduzi nke usoro telivishọn a ma ama Wlad Lahlal na maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri Gates of the Sun

N'afọ 2014, a họpụtara Rahim maka ihe nkiri Les portes du soleil: Algérie pour toujours (Gates of the Sun) nke Jean-Marc Minéo duziri. Ihe nkiri ahụ nwere mmalite ya na 18 Machị  afọ 2015 na Algeria nke nwetara otuto dị egwu ma mesịa gosipụta ya n'ọtụtụ mmemme ihe nkiri. O mekwara ihe nkiri Algeria ruo mgbe ebighị ebi n'afọ 2014.
N'afọ 2019, ọ pụtara na usoro telivishọn Wlad Lahlal nke Nasir al-Din al-Suhaili duziri.
